description: A collection of circles in a large V-shaped formation overlapping a circular formation; there is also a small triangular formation with the point on the bottom attached to the bottom left of the V-shaped formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark blue triangle above and to the left of the center of the V-shaped formation and a dark magenta triangle above and to the right of the center.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
